evidence.claim: RxStrategies utilizes AWS for scalable cloud services including storage and compute.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations to safeguard patient data.
They support interoperability with FHIR standards for health data exchange.
Use of X12 standards for electronic healthcare transactions is a critical part of their EDI capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: RxStrategies uses X12 for healthcare data, fitting an API-first model for exchanges.
